overview: What happens when online bullying and harassment have gone too far? Who do you call to set things straight? Who can help you salvage your reputation or get you payback? The TROLL can help. This dark web show features 4 new students and the Troll is here to teach them there are repercussions to their keyboard antics.
tagline: Sticks and stones... words CAN hurt you.
title: Trolled
